Title: Relates to prehospital emergency medical care for and transportation of stroke patients
Summary: Requires the department of health, the state emergency medical services council and the regional emergency medical services council to update their policies, procedures, and protocols for prehospital emergency medical care and transportation related to the assessment, treatment and transport of stroke patients by a provider of an emergency medical service or an ambulance service.
LawCode: Add ยง3004, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prehospital emergency medical care policies and procedures for certain stroke patients
